constraint.name: Array
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid array

constraint.name: Assert True
constraint.description: check that the value is true

constraint.name: Assert False
constraint.description: check that the value is false

constraint.name: Binary
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid binary value

constraint.name: Boolean
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid boolean value
constraint.error-message: {display} is not a valid boolean value

constraint.name: Credit Card Number
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid credit card number
constraint.error-message: {display} is an invalid credit card number.

constraint.name: Date
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid date

constraint.name: Email
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid email address

constraint.name: Future
constraint.description: checks that the value is in the future relative to now() (default) or the date if a date is provided.

constraint.name: GUID
constraint.description: check that the value is a valid GUID

constraint.name: In List
constraint.description: check that the value is in the list provided
constraint.error-message: The value for {display} is not in the list {list}.

constraint.name: Is Match
constraint.description: checks to see if the current property matches the string provided or another property value by using {propertyname}
constraint.error-message: The value for {display} is not the same as {ismatch}.

constraint.name: Lowercase
constraint.description: check that the value is all lowercase

constraint.name: Max
constraint.description: checks that a string is at least max number of characters or that a number is at least eqaul to max
constraint.error-message: {display} must be less than or equal to {max}.

constraint.name: Min
constraint.description: checks that a string is at least min number of characters or that a number is at least eqaul to min
constraint.error-message: {display} must be greater than or equal to {min}.

constraint.name: Not Empty
constraint.description: Checks that a value is not empty. By default (@NotNull | @NotNull true) will trim the whitespace from a string.
constraint.error-message: The field {display} must contain a value.

constraint.name: Not In List
constraint.description: checks that a value is not in the list provided
constraint.error-message: The value for {display} is in the list {list} and should not be.

constraint.name: Numeric
constraint.description: checks that a value is numeric
constraint.error-message: {display} is not a valid numeric value.

constraint.name: Password
constraint.description: checks that the value is greater than min, less than max and passes security level.

constraint.name: Past
constraint.description: checks that the value is in the past relative to now() (default) or the date if a date is provided.

constraint.name: Phone
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid phone number.

constraint.name: Query
constraint.description: checks that a value is a query object

constraint.name: Range
constraint.description: checks that the value is greater than or equal to start and less than or equal end.
constraint.error-message: {display} does not fall between the range of {range}.

constraint.name: Size
constraint.description: checks that the length of a list,array or struct falls between the min and max attribute values.
constraint.error-message: {display} does not fall between the size {min} - {max}.

constraint.name: Social Security Number
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid social security number.
constraint.error-message: {display} is an invalid social security number.

constraint.name: String
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid string.

constraint.name: Struct
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid struct.

constraint.name: URL
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid URL.

constraint.name: Uppercase
constraint.description: checks that the value is a string in all uppercase.

constraint.name: UUID
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid UUID.

constraint.name: VariableName
constraint.description: Checks that the value is a valid variable name.

constraint.name: Zip Code
constraint.description: checks that the value is a valid U.S., 5- or 9-digit format ZIP codes.
